frameDefinitions: A Sleeper goes from wakefulness to an altered state of consciousness where they are largely unaware of their environment.
A Protagonist delays a planned action because they cannot or do not want to proceed until an Expected_event occurs.
A New filler occupies a Role or serves a Function after the Old filler ceases to occupy the position.
Due to chemical, nuclear, or other reactions, an Explosive explodes, potentially causing damage to the surrounding area.
The Sleeper stays in an altered state of consciousness with greatly reduced external awareness.

The words in this frame describe situations in which the Perpetrator has sexual intercourse with the Victim forcibly (or by threatening the use of force) and without his or her consent. '' 'Does the press make it more difficult for raped women to obtain justice?'
frameExamples: The cat <t>waited</t> on top of the washer as Elmer popped the lid off the can of cat food and then pounded the can's contents onto the plate
The bomb <t>exploded</t> in the middle of the plaza.
Does the press make it more difficult for <t>raped</t> women to obtain justice?
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Sleeper</fen> is the entity that falls asleep.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> where the event occurs.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event occurs.
The sentient being who cannot proceed with their planned activities until a Salient_entity has arrived or an Expected_event has occurred.
A concrete or abstract entity that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> expects to participate in an <fen>Expected_event</fen>, typically that of arriving at the <fen>Place</fen> of the <fen>Protagonist</fen>.
The <fen>Expected_event</fen> is an event that needs to take place or a state that needs to begin to hold before the <fen>Protagonist</fen> can proceed with their planned activities.
The time period during which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is waiting.
The location in which the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is waiting.
The new filler of the <fen>Role</fen> that was previously occupied by the <fen>Old</fen> filler.
The category that the <fen>New</fen> and <fen>Old</fen> entities fit into as a result of the <fen>Function</fen> they serve.
The (generally desirable) state of affairs that the <fen>New</fen> and <fen>Old</fen> entities are involved in bringing about.
The entity that occupied the <fen>Role</fen> or served the <fen>Function</fen> before the <fen>New</fen> filler.
The time at which the <fen>New</fen> takes up the <fen>Role</fen> previously occupied by the <fen>Old</fen>.
The <fen>Explosive</fen> releases a large amount of force, destroying itself and causing damage to the surrounding area.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the explosion occurs.
The location where the explosion occurs.
The entity that is sleeping.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the sleep occurs.
Where the event takes place.
This is the person who forces another person to have sexual intercourse with him or her against the other person's will.
This is the person who is forced to engage in sexual intercourse against his or her will.
The rape of a <fen>Victim</fen> by the <fen>Perpetrator</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
listRoleExamples: <fex>He</fex> politely waited, hat in hand, until he could speak.
In busier times several passengers are waiting <fex>for the train</fex>.
She did n't wait <fex>for a reply</fex>, but spelled out the answer herself.
At least 17 ships were waiting <fex>yesterday</fex> to come up the river.
Reporters are waiting <fex>outside the State Guesthouse</fex> for the talks to start .
The traditional thatched roof has often been replaced <fex>by corrugated galvanized iron</fex>.
What gas replaced Hydrogen <fex>as a safer medium for use in balloons</fex> on account it does not burn?
Oil and gas replaced coal <fex>in heating homes, in industry, and in transportation</fex>.
The electron was discovered and <fex>electricity</fex> replaced gas lamps.
When electricity replaced oil <fex>in the early 1930's</fex>, the steady beam was replaced by a flashing light.
<fex>The bomb</fex> exploded in the middle of the plaza.
The lawyer said the woman was raped <fex>on a night of madness</fex>

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Coalition of Cambodian Apparel Workers' Democratic Union
the Collective Union of Movement of Workers
